body_html:
@skye I ran the tensorflow training on bare-metal. The error is sporadic; though after using Tensorflow 1.0.1, the error is seldom coming within 50000 iterations. I am collecting stacktrace with "strace -p " and during the error , it only shows waitpid(-1), nothing more.
@pedropgusmao Yes, I am using CUDA8 from cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2_8.0.54-1_ppc64el-deb from https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads-power8 .
body_text:
@skye  I ran the tensorflow training on bare-metal. The error is sporadic; though after using Tensorflow 1.0.1, the error is seldom coming within 50000 iterations.  I am collecting stacktrace with "strace -p " and during the error , it only shows waitpid(-1), nothing more.
@pedropgusmao Yes, I am using CUDA8 from cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2_8.0.54-1_ppc64el-deb from https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads-power8 .
body:
@skye  I ran the tensorflow training on bare-metal. The error is sporadic; though after using Tensorflow 1.0.1, the error is seldom coming within 50000 iterations.  I am collecting stacktrace with "strace -p <pid>" and during the error , it only shows waitpid(-1), nothing more.
@pedropgusmao Yes, I am using CUDA8 from cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2_8.0.54-1_ppc64el-deb from https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-downloads-power8 .
